title: 02/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 02/04/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
In this Best Of The Herd, Colin has proclaimed a new rule for the show, no more talking about Tom Brady retiring until he brings it up because Brady's already looking towards next year in Tampa Bay. Houston quarterback Deshaun Watson is doing his best to focus on the future while everyone else has opinions on what he should be doing. Plus, Tom Brady still shows love for Boston even though it feels like forever since he played a game in a Patriots jersey.


Guests: Russell Wilson & Ryan Fitzpatrick


Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
